values:
Well...havent things changed around these parts.

It has been a long long time.

I am a happy happy lass!

I am deeply saddened. Today I learnt that my dear friend passed away late December. James I will never forget the time we spent on MSN together, the cards you sent and the endless late night chats. You were a beautiful soul. I miss you. I lost contact with you late last year caught up in my own life and problems which I did not want to burden you with. You were so generous and so strong. Life was not kind to you but you made damn sure it was not going to get you down. You were an inspiration. Taken from a journal entry of mine 1st May 2004. 1. Who are you? James 2. Are we friends? Damn right we are 3. When and how did we meet? In Dees forum 4. How have I affected you? You made me feel loved and see the truth 5. What do you think of me? You're strong but fragile 6. What's the fondest memory you have of me? Too many to choose 7. How long do you think we will be friends? Forever! 8. Do you love me? yes 9. Do you have a crush on me? hmm, crush implies silliness ;) 10. Would you kiss me? YES 11. Would you hug me? forever 12. Physically, what stands out? Eyes and lips *purr* 13. Emotionally, what stands out? Your caring nature 14. Do you wish I was cooler? Only in summer 15. On a scale of 1-10, how hot am I? 15 16. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. . Snookums, because it's a daft question! 17. Am I loveable? Totally 18. How long have you known me? ooh, 10 months? 19. Describe me in one word. Seductive. 20. What was your first impression? You were sexy and kind 21. Do you still think that way about me now? Absolutely. 22. What do you think my weakness is? kittens! 23. Do you think I'll get married? I hope so! 24. What makes me happy? Being loved. 25. What makes me sad? Being alone. 26. What reminds you of me? Dentists. 27. If you could give me anything what would it be? a plane ticket! 28. How well do you know me? Very well I think. 29. When's the last time you saw me? online a few weeks back 30. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't? yes 31. Do you think I could kill someone? Mmm, no, just a good kicking! 32. Are you going to put this on your LiveJournal and see what I say about you? I did! Rest in peace you kinky sod. Forever friends. I love you. Amanda. xx For those that knew him and those that did not please consider a donation to the Jennifer Trust for Spinal Atrophy in loving memory of James 'CountB' Savage.
Come and meet the girls, Perth Members and have a ball!

<center>This journal is for friends only.

If you think you would find my sordid tales interesting, please leave a comment and I will add you.</center>
